description: CSL / 1010 Telecommunication Bill data extraction (Final Unified Schema). This schema forces a single, standardized structure, including nested keys, to ensure consistent CSV output.

provider.description: Name of the telecom provider. MUST be 'CSL'.

__filename.description: The filename of the source PDF document.

customer_name.description: The standardized key for the recipient company name in English.

account_number.description: The standardized key for the account number, including hyphens.

invoice_number.description: The standardized key for the invoice number. CSL bills do not have this, so the value should be null.

invoice_date.description: The standardized key for the issue date, from 'Bill Cut Date', in YYYY-MM-DD format.

payment_due_date.description: The standardized key for the payment due date, from 'Due Date', in YYYY-MM-DD format.

billing_summary.description: A standardized object for the summary of charges, payments, and balances.

balance_forwarded.description: Standardized key. Corresponds to 'Balance Brought Forward'.

current_charges.description: Standardized key. Corresponds to 'Current Charges Sub-Total'.

service_details.description: A standardized array for all charge details. For CSL, this will contain a single object representing the main mobile number.

service_number.description: Standardized key. The 8-digit mobile number from the 'Mobile No.' field.

user_name.description: The standardized key for the user's name. Not applicable for CSL, so the value should be null.

subtotal.description: The subtotal for the service number, corresponding to 'Current Charges Sub-Total'.

charge_items.description: A standardized array for all individual charge and incentive line items.

description.description: Standardized key. The English description of the charge.

period.description: Standardized key. The service period, in 'YYYY/MM/DD - YYYY/MM/DD' format. Can be null.

amount.description: Standardized key. The charge amount. Negative for incentives.
